markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Boggard Warrior](/Monsters.aspx?ID=55)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Boggard warriors exalt in single combat, and prefer to fight alone so that none can contest their kills. They have been known to pursue enemies who flee combat with a single-mindedness that seems almost supernatural.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Boggard_BoggardWarrior.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Boggard Warrior](/Monsters.aspx?ID=55)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Amphibious" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=207" />
<trait label="Boggard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=209" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 44</row>

**Perception** +8; darkvision

**Languages**
[Boggard](/Languages.aspx?ID=27)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +0

**Con** +4

**Int** -1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5), [Javelin](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (3)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +5 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 38

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, swim 25 feet; swamp stride

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
club +10,
**Damage** 1d6+6 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tongue +10 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** Tongue Grab

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
javelin +6 ([thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
club +6 ([thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+6 bludgeoning

**Terrifying Croak** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The boggard warrior unleashes a terrifying croak. Any non-boggard within 30 feet becomes [_frightened 1_](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) unless they succeed at a DC 18 Will save; those who critically succeed are temporarily immune for 1 minute.

**Tongue Grab**   If the boggard warrior hits a creature with its tongue, that creature becomes [_grabbed_](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) by the boggard. Unlike with a normal grab, the creature isn’t [_immobilized_](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24), but it can’t move beyond the reach of the boggard’s tongue. A creature can sever the tongue by hitting AC 15 and dealing at least 3 slashing damage. Though this doesn’t deal any damage to the boggard, it prevents it from using its tongue Strike until it regrows its tongue, which takes a week.

**Swamp Stride**   A boggard warrior ignores difficult terrain caused by swamp terrain features.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-16" />
name: Boggard Warrior
